project.description:
This Project is used to create a Jenkins-Docker image.
"Jenkins-Build-Master"
It is a Freestyle-Project.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: ls docker info docker build -t msahib/jenkins-build-master:0.0.${BUILD_NUMBER}_$(date +'%Y-%m-%d') . docker push msahib/jenkins-build-master:0.0.${BUILD_NUMBER}_$(date +'%Y-%m-%d') docker tag msahib/jenkins-build-master:0.0.${BUILD_NUMBER}_$(date +'%Y-%m-%d') 10.1.7.250/library/jenkins-build-master:0.0.${BUILD_NUMBER}_$(date +'%Y-%m-%d') docker push 10.1.7.250/library/jenkins-build-master:0.0.${BUILD_NUMBER}_$(date +'%Y-%m-%d') docker rmi 10.1.7.250/library/jenkins-build-master:0.0.${BUILD_NUMBER}_$(date +'%Y-%m-%d') docker rmi msahib/jenkins-build-master:0.0.${BUILD_NUMBER}_$(date +'%Y-%m-%d') docker images
